title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 701.8 - Location and hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 701.8 - Location and hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

Requests for records will be accepted, information provided
and records may be viewed (by prior arrangement) from Monday through Friday, except legal holidays, from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. in the offices of the commission
at 270 Broadway, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10007, (212)
577-0700. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
701.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
